name: BangBro
description:
This is my first multiplayer game from the P.Y.O. group.

It's 2 players required.

The rule of the game is who finds the green gem first. He's the winner.

The game has 3 types of items.

1.Extinguisher  Slow down player for 5 sec.

2.Skateboard   Speed up player for 5 sec.

3.Mop   Stun player for 3 sec.
